atk-s0402a13:1_0: 152. Catutthassa paṭhame catūhi paccayehi attano ca parassa ca antarapaṭicchādanavasena
atk-s0402a13:1_1: santharaṇaṁ āmisasanthāro, dhammena santharaṇaṁ dhammasanthāro. Dutiye upasaggamattaṁ viseso.
atk-s0402a13:2: 154. Tatiye vuttappakārassa āmisassa esanā āmisesanā, dhammassa esanā dhammesanā. Catutthe upasaggamattameva viseso.
atk-s0402a13:3: 156. Pañcame matthakappattā āmisapariyesanā āmisapariyeṭṭhi, matthakappattāva dhammapariyesanā dhammapariyeṭṭhīti vuttā.
atk-s0402a13:4: 157. Chaṭṭhe āmisena pūjanaṁ āmisapūjā, dhammena pūjanaṁ dhammapūjā.
atk-s0402a13:6: 159. Aṭṭhame āmisaṁ ijjhanakasamijjhanakavasena āmisiddhi, dhammopi ijjhanakasamijjhanakavasena dhammiddhi.
atk-s0402a13:7: 160. Navame āmisena vaḍḍhanaṁ āmisavuddhi, dhammena vaḍḍhanaṁ dhammavuddhi.
atk-s0402a13:8: 161. Dasame ratikaraṇaṭṭhena āmisaṁ āmisaratanaṁ, dhammo dhammaratanaṁ.
atk-s0402a13:10: 162. Ekādasame āmisassa cinanaṁ vaḍḍhanaṁ āmisasannicayo, dhammassa cinanaṁ vaḍḍhanaṁ dhammasannicayo.
atk-s0402a13:11: 163. Dvādasame āmisassa vipulabhāvo āmisavepullaṁ, dhammassa vipulabhāvo dhammavepullanti.
